alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena, northern Tangipahoa and west central Washington Parishes, southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kentwood, or 10 miles north of Amite, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Roseland, Osyka, Darlington, Easleyville, Wilmer and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 46 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
